tab1.text1: Welkom bij GitGud Game Servers. Deze server wordt thuis gehost op een dedicated server. Lees onze regels zodat je niet gebanned wordt. Als je hulp nodig hebt join dan onze discord en maak een ticket aan. Veel Plezier!
tab1.text2: Welcome to GitGud Game Servers. This server is being host at home on our own dedicated server. Make sure you read out rules so you wont get banned. If you need support then please join our discord and make a ticket. Have fun!

tab2.text2:
No hacking or abusing any game bugs or exploits

No repeated attacks on fresh spawns

We do not replace items stolen by insiding, you invited them in ur tribe

We do not refund Items/Dinos from server crashes, its still in early access stuff happends

No building at obelisks, swamp cave and easy and hard underwater cave. Tribes that build inside are tribe wiped

No meshed structures

Fob bases must be cleared within 24H after a raid

No raiding allowed with tunnel builds. This includes structures on a platform or raft to avoid turrets

NO teaming to attack a differend tribe. Raids are 1 tribe vs 1 tribe.
